div.p: My friendly greetings and willing service beforehand, faithful, dear sir and godfather. While you and others might wonder what those from Schwyz have presented to our high authority, you should know that it is not unfriendly, but solely concerning the matters in the GÃ¤stal, which Schwyz and Glarus govern together.
Our confederates from Schwyz have, in the last discord, granted some freedoms and a part of the lesser...
